programme.title: Britains Pompeii: A Village Lost in Time
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts joins the team excavating a 3,000 year-old Bronze Age village in the Cambridgeshire Fens thats been called the British Pompeii. The village earned its nickname because, 3,000 years ago, it burned to the ground - as it burned, it fell into the peat, preserving both the houses and their contents. Until its discovery, we had little real idea of what life was like in Bronze Age Britain.

programme.title: Sounds of the 70s 2
programme.desc: Imported American soul was big news in the UK in the 1970s. Before the Brits developed their own brand of soul, the Americans were over here showing us how it was done and being appreciated by all and sundry. programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, James May and Richard Hammond attempt to race from Northern Canada to the North Pole, 450 miles away. programme.desc: Its the series finale, and the teams must race from Medellín, Colombias second-largest city, in an epic push of over 1,000km to the finish line on the Guajira Peninsula, the northernmost region of South America. They can either cut a course inland or follow the tourist trail along the Caribbean coast. After 33 days and nearly 5,900km, which team will triumph and be the first to sign the all-important book and be crowned the winners?

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Leg three with antiques experts Charles Hanson and Roo Irvine. Follow their adventure around the West Midlands.

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Sara Cox and the team meet Steven, a fourth-generation baker who longs to see his familys beloved bakery brought back to life in miniature. Once the heart of local life, the business has since been lost to changing times.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Two-Faced Baby Soap, Garden Festival Glasses, Coconut Shy Box
programme.desc: The dealers come face to face with their creepiest item yet, enjoy all the fun of the fair, and 10-year-old Cassie tries to pull their strings with her vintage puppets.

programme.title: Our Lives
programme.desc: Following four families as they compete in Scotlands haggis contest. All hail from small butcher shops and each has ambitions of winning the World Haggis Championships in Perth. We meet the butchers, see life on farms, and learn how haggis is made.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking
programme.desc: Derek explores castles near Cardiff, the coast of Gower and the relics of the River Wye.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Brainbox Challenge
programme.desc: Clive Anderson hosts a brain training quiz show in which contestants battle to prove themselves in a sequence of brain games which test their memory, language, visual, numerical and spacial skills.

programme.title: Astaire and Rogers Sing the Great American Songbook
programme.desc: Compilation of memorable songs from the `Great American Songbook sung by Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers in their films.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Seals, parakeets and even pelicans that eat pigeons have all made London their home. Thats as well as badgers, foxes, scorpions, and pigeons that ride the tube. Even more wonderful are the people who love the exotic wildlife of our capital, from Billingsgate fish porters to Indian Chefs and `Crayfish Bob, who scours Londons canals for Turkish invaders.

programme.title: Jesus Christ Superstar
programme.desc: Contemporary Israel is the setting for the film version of the rock opera based on the last week of Christs life, and his relationships with those that loved and followed him.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: At Peterborough Cathedral, Phillip Serrell gets fired up when he spots a superb Moorcroft vase, however Charlie Ross only gets excited over an assortment of watches once they grab the bidders attention at the auction and exceed all expectations. Taking time out, Paul Martin slips on his walking boots for a tour around Stamford, one of the prettiest Georgian towns in England.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: In this special festive edition, celebrity contestants Richie Anderson, Simon Gregson, Jessica Knappett and Debbie McGee take on a series of rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur East is on hand with even more Strictly exclusives and is joined by a trio of celebrity super fans in the Friday Panel. Who do they think will miss out on a place in the final?

programme.title: Snow Dogs
programme.desc: Wildlife film-maker Gordon Buchanan gets close to seven incredible huskies on a treacherous dogsled adventure through Canadas spectacular Yukon wilderness, gaining a new appreciation for dogs and our place in nature.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Horticulturists offer various techniques to elevate the home gardening experience, from repositioning roses in rustic layouts to planning vibrant spring displays.

programme.title: Michael Palins Himalaya: Journey of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Michael Palin revisits his fifth travel series, a journey to explore the Himalaya. Featuring fans including Levison Wood and Ade Adepitan as they reflect on his achievement.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Get Carter
programme.desc: Hard-hitting British thriller about a London villain who makes the journey north to avenge the death of his brother. Using ruthless methods, Jack Carter unearths the sordid conspiracy - involving drugs, gambling and porn - that took his brothers life in a Newcastle gangland killing.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: The UK is plagued by potholes. They can cost drivers dear, injure and even kill. So why are there so many, and why are councils struggling to stay on top of the problem? Richard Bilton investigates.

programme.title: Wild Cherry
programme.sub-title: Why Should We Be the Ones Shamed
programme.desc: The town grieves a loss, while the police investigate. Will mothers and daughters lie to protect themselves? Juliets life falls apart when Gigi comes to dinner.

programme.title: The Man in the Mask: An Orkney Murder
programme.desc: Hazel investigates the backgrounds of victim Shamsuddin Mahmoud and convicted murderer Michael Ross. She explores whether it could have been a hitman who committed the murder.

programme.title: The Crash Detectives
programme.desc: A meticulous search for evidence is launched to find out why a driver lost control and collided with a lorry on a dual carriageway. Piece by piece, a clearer picture begins to form.

programme.desc: Its Christmastime, and Dodge is asked by Miss Collie to direct the school Christmas show.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

Best friends Uma and Anna are both hoping for the lead, but will they be happy with their parts? Meanwhile, singer Max has been busy writing new songs over the summer, and his dreams of life as a pop star are ever closer as he releases new music.

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: Adam and Joe dive into Callums next challenge, causing a splash as they become mermaids. They each prepare a hilarious audition tape for Callum to decide who will win the part.

programme.title: Blue Peter
programme.desc: The best of 2024.

programme.title: Gardeners World

programme.title: Beechgrove
programme.desc: The Beechgrove team serve up some gardening pearls of wisdom.

programme.title: Holiday Affair
programme.desc: Just before Christmas, department store clerk Steve Mason meets big spending customer Connie Ennis, really a commercial spy. He unmasks her but lets her go, which gets him fired. They end up on a date, which doesnt sit well with Connies steady suitor, Carl.

programme.title: Alison Hammonds Florida Unpacked
programme.desc: Alison and Aidan road-trip through the Florida Keys. Aidan needs a little persuading to go tandem paragliding, and they kick off the day with an early morning turtle watch.

programme.title: Nigella: Cook, Eat, Repeat
programme.desc: The Christmas tree is up, the tea lights are sparkling, wood is burning in the fire pit and its the culinary highlight of the festive season and the year. Nigella is indulging in a little kitchen table tourism with food from near and far. Expect wintry walks, bolstered by warming and celebratory food and drink: melt-in-the-mouth Linzer cookies, gloriously pink pomegranate cocktails, smoke salmon on black bread and Norwegian pork ribs with Swedish-inspired Janssons temptation.

programme.title: Gorilla Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan returns to the Democratic Republic of Congo to discover the fate of his gorilla family. When he left, Chimanuka the silverback was being challenged by a rival. At stake were the lives of two of his children, Marhale the orphan and the baby Mwira. Having reconnected with his family, Gordon discovers they face a new threat - poachers in the forest.

programme.title: International Netball LIVE
programme.sub-title: Horizon Series, 3rd Test: England v Jamaica
programme.desc: The two match series begins as England take on Jamaica. Betty Glover is joined by former Roses players Serena Guthrie, Jodie Gibson and Chelsea Pitman at the Copperbox in London.

programme.title: Operation Crossbow
programme.desc: As V1 flying bombs fall on London, a gallant team of daring Allied agents are hand-picked to infiltrate and destroy the German weapons research station at Peenemunde. Rumours are rife that German research has led them to develop a new rocket, the even deadlier V2.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin presents from the Old Royal Naval College in Greenwich. Antique expert Philip Serrell discovers a postcard signed by Malcolm Campbell showing him in his boat Bluebird, and Jonathan Pratt gets excited over a collection of fans.

programme.title: Whisky Galore!
programme.desc: Islanders off the coast of Scotland compete with a stuffy English commander to recover 50,000 cases of whisky from a wrecked cargo vessel.

programme.title: Christmas Hits: The Videos that Sleighed
programme.desc: From The Pogues to Paul McCartney, Wham! to Mariah Carey, this documentary reveals the magic and mayhem behind the making of the nations favourite Christmas music videos.

programme.title: Wham! at the BBC
programme.desc: To mark 40 years since the release of their festive classic Last Christmas, Wham! icons Andrew Ridgeley, Pepsi DeMacque and Shirlie Kemp present a selection of the bands biggest and best performances from the BBC archives.

programme.title: WHAM!: Last Christmas Unwrapped
programme.desc: In celebration of the 40th anniversary of a latter-day Christmas classic, artists, music producers, and industry experts delve into the compelling inside story of the creation and enduring appeal of `Last Christmas.

programme.desc: George Michael was one of Britains best-loved and most acclaimed music stars. With Wham!, the group George formed alongside best friend Andrew Ridgely, he created an 80s phenomenon.

programme.desc: The lives of four adults, Émilie, Camille, Nora and Amber, who are friends and sometimes lovers.

programme.desc: Produced by the English National Opera, Les Dennis stars in Gilbert and Sullivans comic opera HMS PINAFORE - a hilarious tale of love, honour and duty.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross paints a summer landscape, featuring a grassy meadow and a cabin by the lake.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross uses snowy mountain peaks as the backdrop for a winding waterway and evergreen trees.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A man continues to dominate his wife even after his death by persuading a surgeon to perform a macabre experiment.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: The mysterious murder weapon used to kill a young policeman cant be found.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A lawyer, soon to become mayor, extends an invitation to a woman who once accused him of embezzlement.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: An old, unemployed actor (Herbert Marshall) uses an even older ploy to get a part in a play. With Tom Helmore and Julia Adams.

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of the award-winning director behind movies such as The Manchurian Candidate, Birdman of Alcatraz, The Train and Ronin.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: Christian Bale: The man behind a plethora of iconic characters; from Batman to Patrick Bateman, explore the life and career of one of Hollywoods finest.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Billys new landlady is kind and friendly, but he cant help feeling uneasy about the place, particularly as the last two guests signed in over two years ago and no one has stayed there since.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: The rich and beautiful Lady Turton flaunts her lovers in front of her husband, but the disapproving butler sees the perfect chance for revenge.

programme.title: Dickens in Italy with David Harewood
programme.desc: David Harewood investigates the influence that Italy had on Charles Dickens, discovering that the quintessentially English author lived a far more cosmopolitan life than expected.

programme.title: Musical Masterpieces
programme.desc: Myleene Klass and composer Errollyn Wallen delve into the history of Felix Mendelssohns Hebrides Overture to understand the techniques that shaped the piece, featuring a special performance from the Philharmonia Orchestra.

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of the Academy Award-winning director behind The Sound of Music, West Side Story and Star Trek: The Motion Picture.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: Se7en, Fight Club, Fury, World War Z and Troy; this man is no stranger to the big screen. Get to grips with the life and career of this Academy Award winner.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A young couples lives are strangely altered when the wife becomes obsessed with a stray cat.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A tourist on a transatlantic liner stakes his all on one last, desperate gamble.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: The relationship between an alcoholic plantation owner and his partner is tested when one awakens with a venomous snake in their bed.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A couple (Biff McGuire, Cloris Leachman) on a train promise their son money if he doesnt interrupt a cowboys (Chill Wills) story.

programme.title: Guy Garvey: From the Vaults
programme.desc: Guy revisits 198, a year which sees Frankie Goes To Hollywood and Tom Robinson release war-themed songs. The Pogues, meanwhile, make an early TV appearance.

programme.title: Pet Shop Boys Dreamworld: The Greatest Hits Live at the Royal Arena Copenhagen
programme.desc: Pet Shop Boys perform their greatest hits tour at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen.

programme.title: Gary Numan Resurrection
programme.desc: 40 years after he last played the Wembley Arena, Gary Numan staged the comeback of a lifetime. Follow Numan on his road back to Wembley and follow his turbulent careers, from the crushing lows to the exhilarating highs.

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.desc: Arguably the first supergroup, Cream featuring Ginger Baker, Jack Bruce, Eric Clapton, lyricist Pete Brown, artist and lyricist Martin Sharp, producer Felix Pappalardi and legendary engineer Tom Dowd, achieved massive worldwide success and ensured their place in rocks hall of fame with `Disraeli Gears in 1967. With interviews musical demonstration, acoustic performance and archive footage.

programme.title: Discovering Lennon
programme.desc: Commemorating the 30th anniversary of the former Beatles death, an extensive collection of TV interviews paint a unique portrait of the singer-songwriter, political activist and icon.

programme.title: The Art of Architecture
programme.desc: An inside look at the architecture behind Londons new Design Museum in Kensington, a result of minimalist John Pawsons exquisite vision.

programme.title: Tchaikovsky, Swan Lake
programme.desc: Swan Lake by Peter Tchaikovsky, conducted by John Lanchbery, Orchestra of the Vienna State Opera.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Yvess marriage has gone stale and his young mistress has announced that she is pregnant. But he then makes a decision which changes everyones lives forever.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: When pretty hotel worker Elly is charmed by a guest, archaeologist Max Kelada, it seems that the Mr Know-All professor might not be the man he claims to be.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A flamboyant stranger goads a young man into taking a frightening bet whilst on holiday in Jamaica.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.sub-title: Mrs Bixby and the Colonels Coat
programme.desc: An unfaithful wife tries to explain away her lovers gift of an expensive mink coat without arousing her husbands suspicions.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A man continues to dominate his wife even after his death by persuading a surgeon to perform a macabre experiment.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A man (Gary Merrill) must stop his wife (Joan Fontaine) from alienating family and friends.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.sub-title: Ill Be Judge, Ill Be Jury
programme.desc: The relatives (Ed Nelson, Sarah Marshall) of a murdered newlywed decide to bring the killer to justice. With Peter Graves.

programme.title: My Fair Lady
programme.desc: Multi Oscar winning musical, based on George Bernard Shaws `Pygmalion, about a phonetics expert who, for a bet, takes on the challenge of teaching a Cockney flower girl to talk like a duchess. All the songs from the stage musical were retained, including `The Rain in Spain, I Could Have Danced All Night, With a Little Bit of Luck, and Wouldnt It Be Loverly.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Under the watchful eye of the judges, six celebrities sit down to paint one of Slades Noddy Holder, designer Lawrence Llewelyn-Bowen.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Artists from across the UK and Ireland compete in a battle of skill as they attempt to produce portraits of famous sitters. The winner will receive a £10,000 prize, along with their winning portrait being hung in a famous cultural institution.

programme.title: Live from Abbey Road: The Very Best Of
programme.sub-title: Paul Simon, David Gilmour and Sheryl Crow
programme.desc: Features Dave Gilmour, Sheryl Crow and Paul Simon performing in an intimate setting.

programme.title: David Bowie: A Reality Tour
programme.desc: David Bowie performs tracks spanning his 30-plus years in the business at Point Theatre in Dublin in 2003 as part of a worldwide tour in support of his Reality album.

programme.title: Becoming Madonna
programme.desc: Madonnas coming-of-age story is one of the greatest in entertainment history. This documentary film traces her transformation from insecure outsider to controversial star.

programme.title: Chic And Nile Rodgers: Jazz A Vienne
programme.desc: Disco legends Chic and Nile Rodgers perform hits including Everybody Dance, Le Freak and Good Times at the 2013 Jazz Vienne music festival in France.

programme.title: Bob Marley: Up Close and Personal
programme.desc: Discover the real Bob Marley, the iconic Jamaican reggae artist, with classic performance footage and conversations with those who knew him best.

programme.title: Bob Marley and the Wailers: The Capitol Session 73
programme.desc: Bob Marley and the Wailers give an intimate performance at Capitol Studios in Hollywood in October 1973.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Nine noble families in the seven kingdoms of Westeros vie for control of the Iron Throne. Meanwhile, a long forgotten race of ancient mythical creatures return to wreak havoc.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: When the beast-themed Animilitia plague Gotham, Batman swings out to investigate. But with The Penguin and his cyber-animals added to the mix, Batman will need the help of Green Arrow and The Flash to bring them to heel.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs. Mutants
programme.desc: Gotham City faces catastrophe when Mr Freeze transforms Killer Croc and Bane into mega-sized mutant monsters. As the gigantic villains go on the rampage, its up to the caped crusader to cut them down to size.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: When the beast-themed Animilitia plague Gotham, Batman swings out to investigate. But with The Penguin and his cyber-animals added to the mix, Batman will need the help of Green Arrow and The Flash to bring them to heel.

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: A sloth named Laura and her family move to the big city with nothing but their prized family recipe book and a rusted old food truck. The familys delicious food soon catches the eye of a quick-witted cheetah named Dotti.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: An ordinary chameleon, Rango, winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: The Ogglies
programme.desc: Young Max meets the Ogglies, a family of green, garbage-eating creatures who live at the dump in the town of Smelliville. When a contractor plans to build a wellness temple at the dump, Max and his pal must hatch a plan to save the Ogglies home.

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: A pair of mice, Vini and Tom, devise a plan to sneak onto Noahs Ark.

programme.title: Piece by Piece
programme.desc: LEGO bricks tell the life story of singer/songwriter and record producer Pharrell Williams -- from his childhood in Virginia to his success in the music and fashion industry.

programme.title: Piece by Piece
programme.desc: LEGO bricks tell the life story of singer/songwriter and record producer Pharrell Williams -- from his childhood in Virginia to his success in the music and fashion industry.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A reluctant bare-knuckle boxer and his manager brother must travel across the country for one last fight, but an unexpected travel companion exposes the cracks in their bond along the way.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Thriller about a photojournalist on board a destroyer, the Bedford, commanded by Captain Finlander. When the ship discovers a Soviet sub in Greenlands territorial waters, the Captain begins a relentless pursuit that pushes his crew to breaking point.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: The Damned United
programme.desc: The story of Brian Cloughs 44 day stint as manager of Leeds United Football Club. England, in 1974. When Don Revie quits Leeds to become the England boss, the outspoken Brian Clough takes charge. Determined to impose his own style upon Revies tough tackling team, Clough soon alienates his players and the board. Based on the book by David Pearce.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an unsophisticated single mother who stumbles upon an environmental cover-up. While working for a lawyer, she is puzzled by an old case and decides to do some research of her own. She discovers that a chemical company knowingly polluted the local area, and with the help of the lawyer launches a class action to sue the company for damages.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A new kid at a school makes the mistake of dating the ex-girlfriend of the school bully, whose gang then make his life a misery. He then bumps into a handyman who also happens to be a karate master. The handyman teaches him martial arts and he eventually meets up with his tormentors at a tournament, but will they fight fair?

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Old rivalries and new adversaries await Daniel and Miyagi as they travel to Okinawa to visit Miyagis ailing father.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: A boy trained in the martial arts is alienated from his mentor just when he needs to prepare for a showdown with his arch-enemy. Instead, he turns to a Vietnam vet who teaches him how to fight dirty - a strategy the youth comes to realise is a mistake.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Martial arts master Miyagi has an uphill battle on his hands when he takes a troubled girl as his latest apprentice.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: After moving to China, twelve-year-old Dre Parker falls in love with his classmate Mei Ying. This soon comes to the attention of the class bully, Cheng.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agencys name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Mercenary Josh Hartnett is assigned a target on a flight. But when rival assassins board the plane, assassin and target are forced to team up. Gory action thriller. (2025, 98 mins)

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a familys pet cat is called, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which, it is believed, can revive the dead, although in doing so they create a monster.

programme.title: Wolf Man

programme.title: Passengers

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO tries to close her hard-partying brothers branch, he and his chief technical officer must inspire their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and save their jobs.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Marmee is the head of the March household in the absence of her husband, whos away fighting in the US Civil War. Her daughters range from the headstrong Jo and sweet Beth, to domesticated Meg and wilful Amy. The film follows the trials and tribulations of the girls, from early poverty and tragedy to Jos later efforts to secure both a husband and a successful writing career, and Amys relationship with an old family friend.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas

What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Based on the play by Morgan Lloyd Malcolm.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: The mob eliminates Jack Dawn and his family. His six year old son, Phil, escapes with Gloria, the girlfriend of one of the gangsters, but they are chased because of a book containing mop accounts.

programme.title: Paradise Highway
programme.desc: To save the life of her brother, truck driver Sally reluctantly agrees to smuggle illicit cargo -- a girl named Leila. As Sally and Leila begin a danger-fraught journey across state lines, a dogged FBI operative sets out on their trail to save them.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officers unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Robert McCalls mysterious past cuts especially close to home when thugs kill Susan Plummer, his best friend and former colleague. Now out for revenge, McCall must take on a crew of highly trained assassins who will stop at nothing to destroy him.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. Using his codename Condor, he contacts the CIA, but when an agent tries to kill him, he kidnaps a stranger off the street to ensure his survival and attempts to turn the tables on those who want him dead.

programme.title: QPR: The Four Year Plan

programme.sub-title: Kau Ka Onohi Alii I Luna (The Royal Eyes Rest Above)

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Deacons family gets caught in the crosshairs of a drug cartel when the team aims to bring down its leader. Hondo receives troubling news regarding his father, Tan is forced to go before an internal review board due to his girlfriends indiscretion.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When a mystery woman attacks the founder of an AI company, the NCIS team must identify the her before the next major global conflict ensues; Kilbrides ex-wife comes to visit and asks him to think about reconnecting with their son.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After Bart fools everyone into believing a child has fallen down a well, Sting joins in a celebrity sing-along.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After Homer gets drunk at a party and leers at Maude Flanders, Marge forces him to accompany her on a marriage counselling weekend at a wooded retreat. Unfortunately, Homer is more interested in catching a legendary local catfish than working on his marriage. Back in Springfield, Bart and Lisa throw a party.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy is tasked by Robert California with finding a job for his wife, except Robert is also adamant that under no circumstances can she work at Dunder Mifflin.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy tries to make holiday wishes come true; Robert decides to drown his sorrows at the office party.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer cashes in on Lisas uncanny knack for picking football game winners.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Micky Flanagan: An Another Fing
programme.desc: Micky Flanagan explores subjects including the French, marriage, Saga holidays with his dad, and his passion for Mary Berry in his hilarious stand-up, recorded live in London.

programme.sub-title: Harry Maguire, Tom Davis, Jon Richardson

programme.desc: Mel Blatt, Betty Boo, Tom Davis, Keith Duffy, and Shane Lynch join the regulars.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.sub-title: Attack of the Five Foot Ten Woman
programme.desc: Carrie spots Mr Big and Natashas wedding announcement in the paper and later bumps into her while shopping, Samantha treats the four friends to a day at a spa where one of the male attendants is reputed to give more than just massages, and Charlotte is shy about disrobing in the steam baths, but later manages to force herself to, and is pleasantly surprised. Elsewhere, Miranda has a new, Ukrainian cleaning lady.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Does gender really exist? Carrie learns her new twenty-something love interest has had intimate relationships with both women and men, Charlottes male alter ego is unleashed in a photo session, and Miranda behaves like the `guy when she feels suffocated by Steve. Meanwhile, Samantha shows her attractive yet obnoxious male assistant whos boss.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Daz of the Proactive team find themselves on a rooftop looking for a burglar. But as pursuit specialists theyre suddenly called away to catch a speeding stolen car in Reading and are soon hot on the tail of a gang of criminals. Meanwhile in Slough, Charlie and Mish have come across a criminal as he takes drugs right under the noses of officers. This programme plays in HD on Sky One HD Channel 175.

programme.title: Road Wars
